ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: I am Krukhan of Grobb on Rallos Zek. I m currently lv5 and a practicing tailor. I ll be glad to attempt armor for anyone who brings me the materials and I m
ygData.messageBody:
I am Krukhan of Grobb on Rallos Zek. I'm currently lv5 and a
practicing tailor. I'll be glad to attempt armor for anyone who brings
me the materials and I'm always up for short guk runs with whoever's
interested. I've been playing the game for a good bit and just
recently started my character over, so i'd be glad to give guidance to
any youngsters in the area.

I agree about the benefits of playing on Zek. It is the only place to
play imo :)


>From: shadowknight-owner@...
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: [shadowknight] New Survey
>Date: 19 Apr 1999 22:32:46 -0000
>
>From: shadowknight-owner@...
>
>Hello,
>
>There is a new survey for the shadowknight community.
>
>Hey guys, this is the list owner, Aminal. I play on the Rellos Zek
server. I am a TSK named Bayln. Its just my opinion, but I think the
Rellos Zek
>server suits the Shadow Knights very well. U can really play out the
sk char, heh.
>
>But, that is only my opinion, and I would like to see what server you
guys are playing on, so please reply to this server! Thanks, Aminal
>
>P.S. If your server is not on the list, I apologize, just click on
other servers.
>
>----
>
>Possible answers are:
>
>o Rellos Zek (PVP)
>o Xegony
>o Fenin Ro
>o Tarew Marr
>o The Rathe
>o Solusek Ro
>o Tunare
>o Karana
>o Test Server
>o Other Servers
>
>
>To vote, please visit the following web page:
>
>http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/shadowknight
>
>
>Thanks!
>
>shadowknight Owner
